title: Libra Taric
body:
Hi! continuing with the zodiac skinline...I present Taric representing Libra.

So my first pick for Libra was actually Kayle followed by Shen and in the sketching process and brainstorming with Kayle I found out that it wasn't that different from her base and with Shen <,< it looked like a version of Scorpion from MK, so I went back to research about Libra and found out that yes, balance and justice are an important part of the sign but also beauty and I came to the conclusion that Libras just like to do things that feel beautiful for them. So here is Taric serving you beauty and yes....Aphrodite of Pisces was a huge inspiration. Hope you enjoy and like the concept.

https://imgur.com/C0SQfog

Aries - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/i2EB0gLl-zodiac-patheon
Taurus - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/OhqTZrLE-taurus-taliyah

replies.body: I mean i'd fondle those gems
yeah royo/vallejo and julie bell are huuuuge influences for me
I am in love with these. My only critique is you could have manipulated his hammer into being a hefty set of scales - What libra wouldn't like smacking people with balance?

Hiya! thanks <3 yeah I tried to make taric's weapon some sort of set of scales but it messed up his silhouette and it didn't look that good, but I put the balance thingy on it...here a close up 
https://imgur.com/DfRRHvN

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XGuKBi5x,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-28T13:27:00.972+0000)
>
> Hiya! thanks <3 yeah I tried to make taric's weapon some sort of set of scales but it messed up his silhouette and it didn't look that good, but I put the balance thingy on it...here a close up 
> https://imgur.com/DfRRHvN

I don't see the scales but a personal thought, since tatic tends to have gems float behind/above his shoulders, why not have the gems be the scales instead?

Maybe the outline of the hammer then, with "cosmic godliness" filling the void between the scales?

Just, as a libra, I would love to hit some disbalanced people with scales. Plus I do that all the time with the lovely Taric. In the jungle. Only jungle.
I'm waiting for Capricorn honestly lmao
